title: Massey University in New Zealand Exchange Information Session
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： Massey University in New Zealand Exchange Information Session
日期： Mon, 4 Mar 2024 16:10:14 +0800
附檔： Massey University Exchange Information Session Poster (Eng).jpg (2 MB)   
Join us for an exchange information session with the Massey University exchange program manager! Mr.Christopher Carey and Ms.Christina Yek from Massey University is visiting National Dong Hwa University to share valuable insights about studying abroad. This session will focus on opportunities for self-funded overseas study for one semester.

Massey University, established in 1927, is one of New Zealand’s leading educational institutions. A Government-funded university, with a proud 90-year tradition of academic excellence and a strong national and international reputation. Massey University is an important part of New Zealand’s tertiary education system, with campuses in Albany (Auckland), Manawat? (Palmerston North) and Wellington,

Learn about the unique programs offered at Massey University in New Zealand that may bring back a memorable experience.

Date: March 13th
Time: 12:30 PM - 1:30 PM
Location: Administration Building, Room 301
Sign up here: https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=20327
